ComicInfo.Summary:
Regular SolicitCan life get any weirder for junior occultist Martin Magus? Living in the haunted city of Dunwich Heights is strange enough for a kid investigating the unknown, but when he comes into possession of a bewitched ring, he discovers that he now has the power to summon Megaghost, a giant supernatural robot sworn to defend the world against the creepy things that go smash in the night!
Limited Edition SolicitCan life get any weirder for junior occultist Martin Magus? Living in the haunted city of Dunwich Heights is strange enough for a kid investigating the unknown, but when he comes into possession of a bewitched ring, he discovers that he now has the power to summon MEGAGHOST, a giant supernatural robot sworn to defend the world against the creepy things that go SMASH in the night!
For the hardcore collectors out there, Albatross offers a special limited edition card stock cover of MEGA GHOST #1 with art by Eric Powell!
